content.question: For which of the following conditions is it not appropriate to assume that the sampling distribution of the sample mean is approximately normal?

choices.label: A random sample of 8 taken from a normally distributed population
A random sample of 50 taken from a normally distributed population
A random sample of 10 taken from a population distribution that is skewed to the right
A random sample of 75 taken from a population distribution that is skewed to the left
A random sample of 100 taken from a population that is uniform

content.answer: A random sample of 10 taken from a population distribution that is skewed to the right
